title: Signal in the Code
text:
Welcome






Purpose & Goal



The Kodonian Project seeks to demonstrate that the Universal Genetic Code contains an embedded signal—an intentional, structured message—suggesting a deeper informational or even extraterrestrial origin behind the blueprint of life on Earth.

title: Inspiration
text: „Life writes in code. We’re only beginning to read.”

title: 1  Demo Site
text:
1.6 2D Molecule








Figure 1.3





This is a span that has the class aside which places it in the margin without a footnote number.
As outlined by Crick and Orgel (1973), pp. 16-18, we find this below. Also by referencing this, we end up there1, as outlined in Figure 1.2. Also refer to Figure 1.1 for more details.




Crick, F. H. C., and L. E. Orgel. 1973. “Directed Panspermia.” Icarus 19 (3): 341–46. https://doi.org/10.1016/0019-1035(73)90110-3.
1 Here is the footnote.

title: References
text:
Crick, F. H. C., and L. E. Orgel. 1973. “Directed
Panspermia.” Icarus 19 (3): 341–46. https://doi.org/10.1016/0019-1035(73)90110-3.


Danckwerts, H. J., and D. Neubert. 1975. “Symmetries of Genetic
Code-Doublets.” Journal of Molecular Evolution 5 (4):
327–32. https://doi.org/10.1007/BF01732219.


Hasegawa, Masami, and Takashi Miyata. 1980. “On the Antisymmetry
of the Amino Acid Code Table.” Origins of Life 10 (3):
265–70. https://doi.org/10.1007/BF00928404.


Jukes, Thomas H. 1973. “Arginine as an Evolutionary Intruder into
Protein Synthesis.” Biochemical and Biophysical Research
Communications 53 (3): 709–14. https://doi.org/10.1016/0006-291X(73)90151-4.


Makukov, Maxim A., and Vladimir I. shCherbak. 2014. “Space Ethics
to Test Directed Panspermia.” Life Sciences in Space
Research 3 (October): 10–17. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.lssr.2014.07.003.


———. 2018. “SETI in Vivo: Testing the We-Are-Them
Hypothesis.” International Journal of Astrobiology 17
(2): 127–46. https://doi.org/10.1017/S1473550417000210.


Nakamura, Hiroshi. 1986. “SV40 DNA—A
Message from ϵ
Eri?” Acta Astronautica 13 (9): 573–78. https://doi.org/10.1016/0094-5765(86)90059-7.


Rietman, Edward A., Robert L. Karp, and Jack A. Tuszynski. 2011.
“Review and Application of Group Theory to Molecular Systems
Biology.” Theoretical Biology and Medical Modelling 8
(1): 21. https://doi.org/10.1186/1742-4682-8-21.


Sharov, Alexei A., and Richard Gordon. 2013. “Life Before
Earth.” arXiv. https://doi.org/10.48550/arXiv.1304.3381.


shCherbak, Vladimir I., and Maxim A. Makukov. 2013. “The
‘Wow! Signal’ of the Terrestrial Genetic
Code.” Icarus 224 (1): 228–42. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.icarus.2013.02.017.


Zhaksybayeva, Olga A. 1996. “Statistical Estimation of Rumer’s
Transformation of the Universal Genetic Code.” Origins of
Life and Evolution of the Biosphere 26 (3): 444–45. https://doi.org/10.1007/BF02459859.
